name: AimTraining (iMACYTV23)
description:
My game is FPS Aim Training, for people who wants to get there aim better. You can try my game. Its has Easy Difficulty For Begginers, Medium For Good Players, Hard For Awesome Players. The only gun you can use is Ak- 47 but it will act as a Pistol, and cannot turn to fully automatic. The Game is Made On Unreal Engine.

YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/AiMAC23

Recommended Requirements

OS: Windows 10 64 bit

Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster

Memory: 8GB ram

Video Card/DirectX Version: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
